name: espn_search
description: Search ESPN for sports content including players, teams, articles, and more. Returns up to 15 results with title, URL, and description.

steps.code: const results = []; document.querySelectorAll('.contentItem, .search-results li, article').forEach((el, i) => { if (i < 15) { const titleEl = el.querySelector('a h2, .contentItem__title, h3 a'); const descEl = el.querySelector('p, .contentItem__subhead'); const linkEl = titleEl?.closest('a') || el.querySelector('a[href]'); results.push({ title: titleEl?.textContent?.trim() || '', url: linkEl?.href || '', description: descEl?.textContent?.trim()?.slice(0, 200) || '' }); } }); return { query: `{{query}}`, result_count: results.length, results: results };
steps.name: search_results
steps.label: Extract search results
